title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, the focus caret should be in the first Combo labeled 'Host'. However, this is not happening.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not result in the focus caret being placed in the first Combo labeled 'Host'.
EB: The focus caret should be automatically placed in the first Combo labeled 'Host' when it is clicked.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 

1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. 
2. Click on the first Combo labeled 'Host'. 
   - The focus caret should now be in this Combo, indicating that it has taken focus.
